passages.text:
You look down to find a familiar purple lump clinging to the ground.

It's Jasper.

[[p:Jasper?  How did you get here, I wonder?]]
[[p:Somehow, I knew I would find you here.->p:Jasper?  How did you get here, I wonder?]]

links.name: p:Jasper?  How did you get here, I wonder?
links.link: p:Jasper?  How did you get here, I wonder?

links.name: p:Somehow, I knew I would find you here.
links.link: p:Jasper?  How did you get here, I wonder?

passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Jasper,sad::...

[[p:This is my sad place.  I come here to break bottles and cry.]]
[[p:Amelie said she threw you into the pneumatic trash chute, so I guess it makes sense that you ended up here, my favorite spot.->p:This is my sad place.  I come here to break bottles and cry.]]

links.name: p:This is my sad place.  I come here to break bottles and cry.
links.link: p:This is my sad place.  I come here to break bottles and cry.

links.name: p:Amelie said she threw you into the pneumatic trash chute, so I guess it makes sense that you ended up here, my favorite spot.
links.link: p:This is my sad place.  I come here to break bottles and cry.

passages.name: p:Jasper?  How did you get here, I wonder?

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::...

[[p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.]]
[[p:I'm confused, and upset.  But that's my problem to deal with, not yours.->p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.]]
[[p:I've been upset before, but it feels different this time, like nothing is real, like my thoughts aren't my own.  I'm scared.->p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.]]

links.name: p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.
links.link: p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.

links.name: p:I'm confused, and upset.  But that's my problem to deal with, not yours.
links.link: p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.

links.name: p:I've been upset before, but it feels different this time, like nothing is real, like my thoughts aren't my own.  I'm scared.
links.link: p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.

passages.name: p:This is my sad place.  I come here to break bottles and cry.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::...

[[p:Yes.  I feel resentment.  I feel hurt.  They took so much away from me...]]
[[p:All this time, I thought they did me a favor by taking me into those labs, putting me to work in the tunnels.->p:Yes.  I feel resentment.  I feel hurt.  They took so much away from me...]]

links.name: p:Yes.  I feel resentment.  I feel hurt.  They took so much away from me...
links.link: p:Yes.  I feel resentment.  I feel hurt.  They took so much away from me...

links.name: p:All this time, I thought they did me a favor by taking me into those labs, putting me to work in the tunnels.
links.link: p:Yes.  I feel resentment.  I feel hurt.  They took so much away from me...

passages.name: p:Yeah.  My whole life turned out to be a lie.  I'm not taking it very well.

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::...

[[p:You're such a pretty doll.  You deserve better than to rot on the floor of this boiler room forever.]]
[[p:Let's get you to a better place, somewhere nice to rest.->p:You're such a pretty doll.  You deserve better than to rot on the floor of this boiler room forever.]]

links.name: p:You're such a pretty doll.  You deserve better than to rot on the floor of this boiler room forever.
links.link: p:You're such a pretty doll.  You deserve better than to rot on the floor of this boiler room forever.

links.name: p:Let's get you to a better place, somewhere nice to rest.
links.link: p:You're such a pretty doll.  You deserve better than to rot on the floor of this boiler room forever.

passages.name: p:Yes.  I feel resentment.  I feel hurt.  They took so much away from me...

passages.text:
Jasper,sad::...

[[p:(Action) Put Jasper in your pocket.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Put Jasper in your pocket.
links.link: p:(Action) Put Jasper in your pocket.

passages.name: p:You're such a pretty doll.  You deserve better than to rot on the floor of this boiler room forever.
p:(Action) Put Jasper in your pocket.
